iceCreams.title: Vanilla Delight
iceCreams.description: A classic vanilla ice cream made with real vanilla beans, offering a creamy and rich flavor.

iceCreams.title: Chocolate Bliss
iceCreams.description: Rich and creamy chocolate ice cream made with premium cocoa, perfect for chocolate lovers.

iceCreams.title: Strawberry Dream
iceCreams.description: A refreshing strawberry ice cream made with real strawberries, ideal for a summer treat.

iceCreams.title: Mint Chocolate Chip
iceCreams.description: Cool mint ice cream with rich chocolate chips, a perfect combination of flavors.

iceCreams.title: Cookies and Cream
iceCreams.description: Creamy vanilla ice cream mixed with chunks of chocolate cookies, a favorite among many.

iceCreams.title: Pistachio Paradise
iceCreams.description: A unique pistachio ice cream made with real pistachios, offering a nutty and creamy experience.

iceCreams.title: Mango Tango
iceCreams.description: A tropical mango ice cream made with real mango puree, perfect for a refreshing treat.

iceCreams.title: Coffee Craze
iceCreams.description: Rich coffee ice cream made with real coffee beans, ideal for coffee lovers.

iceCreams.title: Rocky Road
iceCreams.description: A delightful mix of chocolate ice cream with marshmallows and nuts, a classic favorite.

iceCreams.title: Butter Pecan
iceCreams.description: Creamy butter pecan ice cream with roasted pecans, offering a rich and nutty flavor.

iceCreams.title: chocolate ice cream
iceCreams.description: ice cream with chocolate in it
